name: Theatre Romp
description:
Description

A game made for the 2022 Autumn Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/cozy-autumn-game-jam-2022

You're performing at your school's annual fall play, and the script is all over the place! Perform in a variety 5 unique minigames in the required time limit. As you complete more games, the speed will ramp up. The crowd can never get enough--as long as you perform well, that is!

Controls

Arrow keys - Movement

Space - Action

Attributions

Built with love.js

Various libraries from HUMP

Music by Haley Halcyon: https://2gd4.me/
